treeFormat._comment:
Create the top level directory format for your music folder. The next-to top
					level directory will be the next item in the array and so on. The default
					settings will use the format:
								$ARTIST/[$YEAR] $ALBUM/$DISK_NUM$TRACK_NUM-$ARTIST-$TRACK_TITLE.mp3
								Savant/[2012] Vario/03-savant-living_ipod.mp3
					'format' is the format of your directory/file. Can use wildcards (see below).
					'lowerCase' will force the folder/file to be all in lowercase.
					'lowercase' will force the folder/file to be all in uppercase.
					'replaceSpaces' will replace spaces with underscores.
					
					Available wildcards are:
						$ARTIST
						$ARTIST_OR_VA (uses VA as artist if artist and album artist isn't the same name.)
						$ALBUM
						$ALBUM_ARTIST
						$DISK_NUM
						$GENRE
						$YEAR

folders._comment:
Choose folders to use. Specifying folders in commandline will override these options.
					 Remember to use full paths if you want to be able to run Empytree at any location.
